title: Various Laws About Justice and Family
summary: Deuteronomy 21 covers laws for situations involving unsolved murders, marrying captive women, inheritance rights for sons, and dealing with rebellious children. It also includes the command to bury executed individuals the same day.

faq.question: What was done when a murderâ€™s culprit was unknown?
faq.answer: A ceremony with a sacrificed heifer was performed to remove guilt from the community.

faq.question: What law is given about executed people?
faq.answer: Their bodies were not to be left hanging overnight but buried the same day.
